snippet.title: Fantasy Conquest Tactics Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Playable demo available free at: https://explosive.itch.io/fantasy-conquest-tactics

Fantasy Conquest Tactics is a colorful, quirky tactical strategy game of kingdom conquest and domination, which takes the fast paced, accessible gameplay of Advance Wars, and mashes it with Final Fantasy Tactics style classes and mechanics.  

Scout the land, capture villages and keeps, and use the gold collected to recruit varied units to fight for your cause.  From basic melee swordsman and skilled ranged archers to massively destructive warmachines and tactically diverse magic units, you’ll command more than 20+ units, each with their own unique strengths, weaknesses, and skills.  Outwit and outmaneuver your opponent across diverse terrain types that affect your units movement and defense.
